verses.verse: Now it <S%H1961>came<s%> about <S%H9201>when<s%> the <S%H2346>wall<s%> was <S%H1129>rebuilt<s%> and I had <S%H5975>set<s%> up the <S%H1817>doors,<s%> and the <S%H7778>gatekeepers<s%> and the <S%H7891>singers<s%> and the <S%H3881>Levites<s%> were <S%H6485>appointed,<s%>

that I <S%H6680>put<s%> <S%H2607>Hanani<s%> my <S%H251>brother,<s%> and <S%H2608>Hananiah<s%> the <S%H8269>commander<s%> of the <S%H1002>fortress,<s%> in <S%H5921>charge<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> for he was a <S%H571>faithful<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> and <S%H3372>feared<s%> <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H4480>more<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H7227>many.<s%>

Then I <S%H559>said<s%> to them, "Do not let the <S%H8179>gates<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> be <S%H6605>opened<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> the <S%H8121>sun<s%> is <S%H2552>hot,<s%> and <S%H5704>while<s%> they are <S%H5975>standing<s%> [guard,] let them <S%H1479>shut<s%> and <S%H270>bolt<s%> the <S%H1817>doors.<s%> Also <S%H5975>appoint<s%> <S%H4931>guards<s%> from the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> at his <S%H4929>post,<s%> and <S%H376>each<s%> in <S%H5048>front<s%> of his own <S%H1004>house.<s%>"

Now the <S%H5892>city<s%> was <S%H7342>large<s%> <S%H3027><s%> and <S%H1419>spacious,<s%> but the <S%H5971>people<s%> in it were <S%H4592>few<s%> and the <S%H1004>houses<s%> were not <S%H1129>built.<s%>

Then my <S%H430>God<s%> <S%H5414>put<s%> it into my <S%H3820>heart<s%> to <S%H6908>assemble<s%> the <S%H2715>nobles,<s%> the <S%H5461>officials,<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> to be <S%H3187>enrolled<s%> by <S%H3187>genealogies.<s%> Then I <S%H4672>found<s%> the <S%H5612>book<s%> of the <S%H3188>genealogy<s%> of those who <S%H5927>came<s%> up <S%H7223>first<s%> in which I <S%H4672>found<s%> the following record: <S%H3789><s%>

<S%H428>These<s%> are the <S%H1121>people<s%> of the <S%H4082>province<s%> who <S%H5927>came<s%> up from the <S%H7628>captivity<s%> of the <S%H1473>exiles<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> <S%H5019>Nebuchadnezzar<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H894>Babylon<s%> had <S%H1540>carried<s%> <S%H1540>away,<s%> and who <S%H7725>returned<s%> to <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> and <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> to his <S%H5892>city,<s%>

who <S%H935>came<s%> with <S%H2216>Zerubbabel,<s%> <S%H3091>Jeshua,<s%> <S%H5166>Nehemiah,<s%> <S%H5838>Azariah,<s%> <S%H7485>Raamiah,<s%> <S%H5167>Nahamani,<s%> <S%H4782>Mordecai,<s%> <S%H1114>Bilshan,<s%> <S%H4559>Mispereth,<s%> <S%H902>Bigvai,<s%> <S%H5149>Nehum,<s%> <S%H1196>Baanah.<s%> The <S%H4557>number<s%> of <S%H376>men<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%>
the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of Pahath-moab of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3091>Jeshua<s%> and <S%H3097>Joab,<s%> 2818;
The <S%H3548>priests:<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3048>Jedaiah<s%> of the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3091>Jeshua,<s%> 973;
The <S%H3881>Levites:<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3091>Jeshua,<s%> of <S%H6934>Kadmiel,<s%> of the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1937>Hodevah,<s%> <S%H7657>74.<s%> <S%H702><s%>

The <S%H7778>gatekeepers:<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7967>Shallum,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H333>Ater,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2929>Talmon,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6126>Akkub,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2410>Hatita,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7630>Shobai,<s%> 138.
The <S%H5411>temple<s%> <S%H5411>servants:<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6727>Ziha,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2817>Hasupha,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2884>Tabbaoth,<s%>
the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7026>Keros,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5517>Sia,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6303>Padon,<s%>
the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3838>Lebana,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2286>Hagaba,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8014>Shalmai,<s%>
the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2605>Hanan,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1435>Giddel,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1515>Gahar,<s%>
the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7211>Reaiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H7526>Rezin,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5353>Nekoda,<s%>
the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1502>Gazzam,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5798>Uzza,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6454>Paseah,<s%>
the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1153>Besai,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4586>Meunim,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5304>Nephushesim,<s%>
the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1227>Bakbuk,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2709>Hakupha,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2744>Harhur,<s%>
the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1213>Bazlith,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H4240>Mehida,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2797>Harsha,<s%>
the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1302>Barkos,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5516>Sisera,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8547>Temah,<s%>
The <S%H1121>sons<s%> of Solomon's <S%H5650>servants:<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5479>Sotai,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5618>Sophereth,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6514>Perida,<s%>
the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3279>Jaala,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1874>Darkon,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1435>Giddel,<s%>
the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H8203>Shephatiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2411>Hattil,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of Pochereth-hazzebaim, the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H526>Amon.<s%>

And <S%H428>these<s%> [were] they who <S%H5927>came<s%> up from Tel-melah, Tel-harsha, <S%H3743>Cherub,<s%> <S%H114>Addon,<s%> and <S%H564>Immer;<s%> but they <S%H3201>could<s%> not <S%H5046>show<s%> their fathers' <S%H1004>houses<s%> or their <S%H2233>descendants,<s%> <S%H518>whether<s%> they were of Israel: <S%H3478><s%>
the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1806>Delaiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2900>Tobiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H5353>Nekoda,<s%> 642.

And of the <S%H3548>priests:<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H2252>Hobaiah,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H6976>Hakkoz,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H1271>Barzillai,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> of the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H1271>Barzillai,<s%> the <S%H1569>Gileadite,<s%> and was <S%H7121>named<s%> <S%H8034><s%> <S%H5921>after<s%> them.

<S%H428>These<s%> <S%H1245>searched<s%> [among] their <S%H3187>ancestral<s%> <S%H3791>registration,<s%> <S%H3187><s%> but it could not be <S%H4672>located;<s%> therefore they were considered <S%H1351>unclean<s%> [and excluded] from the <S%H3550>priesthood.<s%>

And the <S%H8660>governor<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to them that they should not <S%H398>eat<s%> from the <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> <S%H6944>things<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> a <S%H3548>priest<s%> <S%H5975>arose<s%> with <S%H224>Urim<s%> and <S%H8550>Thummim.<s%>

<S%H4480>besides<s%> <S%H905><s%> their <S%H5650>male<s%> and their <S%H519>female<s%> <S%H5650>servants,<s%> <S%H519><s%> of <S%H428>whom<s%> [there were] 7337; and they <S%H245>had<s%> male and female <S%H7891>singers.<s%>

And <S%H4480>some<s%> from among the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of fathers' [households] <S%H5414>gave<s%> to the <S%H4399>work.<s%> The <S%H8660>governor<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> to the <S%H214>treasury<s%> 1000 <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H1871>drachmas,<s%> <S%H2572>50<s%> <S%H4219>basins,<s%> 530 priests' <S%H3801>garments.<s%>

And <S%H4480>some<s%> of the <S%H7218>heads<s%> of fathers' [households] <S%H5414>gave<s%> into the <S%H214>treasury<s%> of the <S%H4399>work<s%> 20000 <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H1871>drachmas,<s%> and 2200 <S%H3701>silver<s%> <S%H4488>minas.<s%>

And that <S%H834>which<s%> the <S%H7611>rest<s%> of the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> was 20000 <S%H2091>gold<s%> <S%H1871>drachmas<s%> and 2000 <S%H3701>silver<s%> <S%H4488>minas,<s%> and <S%H8346>67<s%> <S%H7651><s%> priests' <S%H3801>garments.<s%>

Now the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> the <S%H3881>Levites,<s%> the <S%H7778>gatekeepers,<s%> the <S%H7891>singers,<s%> <S%H4480>some<s%> of the <S%H5971>people,<s%> the <S%H5411>temple<s%> <S%H5411>servants,<s%> and <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3427>lived<s%> in their <S%H5892>cities.<s%> And when the <S%H7637>seventh<s%> <S%H2320>month<s%> <S%H5060>came,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> [were] in their <S%H5892>cities.<s%>
